蒝字的基本解释

蒝
yuán
草木茎叶散布的样子。

蒝
huán
古书上说的一种草。

蒝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuán］
［《廣韻》愚袁切，平元，疑。］
草木茎叶散布貌。

蒝字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蒝； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1048第24
【唐韻】愚袁切，音原。【玉篇】莖葉布也。　又【集韻】取絹切，音㸑。草木貌，一曰草名。

蒝字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蒝字的起名意思

草木茎叶散布的样子。古书上说的一种草。

蒝
Basic explanation of words
蒝
yuán
The way the stems and leaves of vegetation are scattered.
蒝
huán
A kind of grass said in ancient books.
蒝
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yuán］
["Guang Yun" Yu Yuan Qi, Ping Yuan, doubt. ]
Vegetation stems and leaves are scattered.
蒝
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Jian Zi] 　蒝; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1048 Page 24
[Tang Yun] Yu Yuan cut, phonetic original. [Jade articles] The stems and leaves are also clothed.　[Jiyun] Take silk cut, sound 㸑. The appearance of vegetation, one is the name of the grass.
蒝

蒝
Name meaning
The way the stems and leaves of vegetation are scattered. A kind of grass said in ancient books.
yuán, huán
